resources.string: Your phone is updating now, please retry later.

Coolpad developers are always dedicating to improve the user experience.New system update(Ver %1$s) is ready for download.

File Size:%2$sKB
Description:%3$s

Tip: Download the update package may generate data communication costs.
Coolpad OTA server is not available now, please retry later.
Please insert SIM card or enable data connection!
You need to download upgrade packs to T-Flash card. Please insert T-Flash card and retry.
Insufficient card space. Please delete some contents and retry.
Too low battery, please re-upgrade while battery is enough!
Your phone software version is the latest one.

New system update(Ver %1$s) is ready for use.

File Size:%2$s
Description:%3$s

System will immediately reboot to start update if you choose Update Now. The software updating might take 10 minutes. During the updating, all the functions will be unavailable, including emergency call. 

Updating doesn't affect your personal data.
It will automatically reboot after update completed.
